content: the same place that the beginning end of the yarn is poking out of tie these two strands together thread both back into the body of the croc and tug slightly that little knot will pop back into the body snip the loose ends optional - knot a length of yarn to the top of the crocodile to use for hanging done criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-crocodile-alligator criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-crocodile-alligator
